title: How indie bookstores might survive the pandemic
description:
There’s a new online bookseller in town that’s trying to save your local indie bookstore.

Featuring
Andy Hunter (@AndyHunter777)
Constance Grady (@constancegrady)

Links to resources discussed:
Vox Book Club, The City We Became, Week 1: New York City is born. What happens next?

In Ask a Book Critic, Vox.com book critic Constance Grady recommends books to suit your very specific mood

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:
Newsletter: Recode Daily 
Twitter: @Recode
